titleStmt.title: In Holbourn over against Southampton-Square, at the coffin and child, against the watch-house, next door to the sugar-loaf and role, where you will see the golden-ball hanging over the passage door, liveth Anne Laverenst a German Gentlewoman.
titleStmt.author: Laverenst, Anne.

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: item at reel E8:2[31])is foxed and faded at foot with some loss of text; reel E8, (551.a.32.[72] appears to be a variant with "Anne Paverenst" instead in caption title; [72] also appears faded at head in caption title.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
